1186750.name: Il Sole e la Luna Demo
1186750.description:
Plot IL SOLE E LA LUNA
One day in a distant Kingdom, two brothers, Sunny and Moony, they were training for the youth.
But they do not know what to do in a fantastic adventure awaits them!

GAME DESCRIPTION

Adventure Fantasy RPG
IL SOLE E LA LUNA
Spectacular RPG set in a fantasy era!
Choose your class: hero, warrior, magician, priest.
Level up, develop equipment, find lots of secrets, find all weapons and defeat mighty gods!
Help Sunny and Moony save the kingdom from an unexpected threat!

Game Features:
Turn-based battles, Hunts, Quest, Open World!
